description:
WFC behavoir to log soap messages and headers with log4net

Add the following in your wcf configuration  <system.serviceModel>:

    <extensions>
      <behaviorExtensions>
        <add name="log4netOutputBehavior" type="WcfBehavoirSoapLog4net.Behavoirs.Log4NetOutputBehaviorExtensionElement, WcfBehavoirSoapLog4net, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" />
        <add name="log4netOutputBehaviorHeaders" type="WcfBehavoirSoapLog4net.Behavoirs.Log4NetOutputHeadersBehaviorExtensionElement, WcfBehavoirSoapLog4net, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" />
      </behaviorExtensions>
    </extensions>
    <behaviors>
      <endpointBehaviors>
        <behavior name="log4NetBehavior">
          <log4netOutputBehavior />
          <log4netOutputBehaviorHeaders />
        </behavior>
      </endpointBehaviors>
    </behaviors>
...
    <client>
      <endpoint ... behaviorConfiguration="log4NetBehavior" />
...
releaseNotes: Testing the package, will add info on how to use soon.
summary: This package enables you to log the incoming and outgoing soap of your wcf client or server connection with log4net.
title: WcfBehavoirSoapLog4net
